scripts.db:init: docker exec -it sd-postgres psql -U sd_admin -d social_distance -c "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, total_distance_meters FLOAT DEFAULT 0.0);"
scripts.dev: npm run services:up && sleep 5 && npm run db:init && node --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning --loader ts-node/esm src/app.ts
scripts.clean: docker exec -it sd-redis redis-cli FLUSHALL && docker exec -it sd-postgres psql -U sd_admin -d social_distance -c 'TRUNCATE users CASCADE;'
scripts.build:ui: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prod: npm run build:ui && npm run dev
